mapper.insert: insert into authority ( authority_name, authority_url, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{authority_name}, #{authority_url}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update authority set authority_name = #{authority_name}, authority_url = #{authority_url}, update_time = now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id,authority_name,authority_url,create_time,update_time from authority order by update_time desc
